mapper.update: UPDATE user_order SET order_status = '배송완료', shipfinish_date = now() WHERE (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - shipstart_date))::Integer > 60 and shipfinish_date is null;
UPDATE deal_info SET deal_status = '종료' WHERE (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - deal_endtime))::Integer > 0 AND deal_status = '게시';
UPDATE product_posting set today_deal = false FROM deal_info di WHERE di.deal_status = '종료' AND di.deal_postid = post_id AND (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW() - di.deal_endtime))::Integer > 0;
